reviewText: good  but not for me for a friend is ok
Great instruction disc to spice up ones bass playing.
Great Book and CD combo! Has tracks minus the drums that you can play along to, Jaime Abersold style.  All the beats and variations are great!

I bought two, one for me, and one for my drummer.

Pros: Breaks down Afro-Cuban styles and funks them up.  Grooves can make ladies booty shake.

Cons: Not for beginners, unless studied with professional.

Robby Ameen has got the best informational DVD's for afro/cuban music hands down. If you're into this style of music and want to learn more, pick up his book with the same title. It comes with MMO tracks on a CD. Personally, I believe it's worth it's weight in gold. One of the best investments you could make concerning your drumming career. You will NOT be disappointed!
